meanings.definition: A person who specializes in cybernetics.
meanings.sent1: The cyberneticians at the conference shared their latest findings.
meanings.sent2: Many cyberneticians work in research labs to develop new technologies.
meanings.sent3: The cyberneticians' annual party was a mix of tech talk and fun games.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, cyberneticians are the wizards behind the curtain.
meanings.sent5: The young student was inspired to become a cybernetician after attending a robotics workshop.

meanings.definition: The cyberneticians are studying the behavior of complex systems.
meanings.sent1: After months of observation, the cyberneticians finally understood the system's patterns.
meanings.sent2: The team of cyberneticians collaborated to analyze the data collected from the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The cyberneticians were puzzled by the unexpected results but remained determined to find an explanation.
meanings.sent4: Like detectives of technology, cyberneticians unravel the mysteries of interconnected systems.
meanings.sent5: The cyberneticians' breakthrough discovery was celebrated by the scientific community.

meanings.definition: The cyberneticians' research focuses on feedback mechanisms.
meanings.sent1: By implementing feedback loops, the cyberneticians improved the system's performance.
meanings.sent2: The cyberneticians presented their findings on feedback mechanisms at the conference.
meanings.sent3: The cyberneticians joked that their work was like teaching a machine to have manners.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, cyberneticians are the conductors of the symphony of feedback.
meanings.sent5: The cyberneticians' innovative approach to feedback mechanisms revolutionized the industry.

meanings.definition: She consulted with cyberneticians to improve the efficiency of the system.
meanings.sent1: The company hired cyberneticians to streamline their operations and reduce costs.
meanings.sent2: After the consultation, the cyberneticians proposed a new strategy to optimize the workflow.
meanings.sent3: The cyberneticians' advice was like a magic spell that made the system run smoothly.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of technology, cyberneticians are the architects of efficiency.
meanings.sent5: The collaboration with cyberneticians led to a significant increase in productivity.
